footerDisplay: For additional info please check the [homebridge-onstar](https://github.com/samrum/homebridge-onstar/) repo.

name.title: Name
name.description: The identifier to use for all commands.

deviceId.title: Device ID
deviceId.description: A random version 4 UUID. Use an online generator to get this.

enableAlert.title: Enable Alert Switch
enableAlert.description: Enables a switch for triggering the 'Alert' action

enableCharger.title: Enable Charger Switch
enableCharger.description: Enables a switch for triggering the 'Charge Override -- Immediate' action

enableDoors.title: Enable Doors Lock
enableDoors.description: Enables a lock for triggering the 'Door Lock/Unlock' action. Note that the lock component will always reset to a Locked state. Siri commands to lock doors will work even if the lock component is in the locked state.

doorsDefaultToUnlocked.title: Doors Default to Unlocked
doorsDefaultToUnlocked.description: Make the Doors Lock default to an Unlocked state instead of Locked.
